The list of metadata and data to collect are inspired by @Givelet.2004, @CourtneyMustaphi.2019, @Kra.1986 and @Jones.2019.

The general collaborative strategy is derived from @Oliver.2018.

The package and website are build using R [@RCoreTeam.2020],  usethis [@Wickham.2020], devtools [@Wickham.2020b], roxygen2 [@Wickham.2020c], pkgdown [@Wickham.2020d], rrtools [@Marwick.2019], rmarkdown [@Allaire.2018], knitr [@Xie.2018], kableExtra [@Zhu.2019] and RStudio [@RStudioTeam.2020].
